channel.title: Homes on Arunav SHandilya
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Arunav Shandilya

item.description: Biography I’m a visiting research student at the Indian Institute of Technology hosted by Prof. Asif Ekbal and Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya in AI-NLP-ML Lab. I am interested in Natural Language Processing, generative modelling and optimizations related problems and their applications. I graduated from International Institute of Information Technology Bhubaneswar, India in 2019 with a Bachelor’s of Technology majors in Electrical and Electronics Engineering with minor in Computer Science where I was fortunate to get to work with Prof. Rakesh Balabantaray. In the summer of 2016, I interned with the wonderful research team at Xerox Research.

item.title: Teaching Experience
item.description: University of Toronto CSC420 - Intro to Image Understanding (Winter 2018), with Prof. Sanja Fidler CSC384 - Intro to AI (Fall 2017), with Prof. Fahiem Bacchus IIT Kanpur CS698U - Topics in Computer Vision (2016-17 II), with Prof. Gaurav Sharma ESC101 - Introduction to Programming - Tutor (2016-17 II), with Prof. Rajat Mittal ESC101 - Introduction to Programming - Tutor (2016-17 I), with Prof. Vinay P. Namboodiri
